well i mean the original original magic tower didn't have enemy encounters
they were literally just a numbers game
is your HP higher than the enemy's attack? is your attack higher than the enemy's defense? are you willing to take the damage needed to beat the enemy? if yes, run face first into it
NAMTG is a magic tower game except instead of it being a pure numbers game, it has the enemy fights
